content: Not specifically FHIR related, but this community seems well positioned. I seem to remember a group a few years ago that was working on a sort of mapping where the input was a patient diagnosis/problem and the output was "relevant clinical content" - labs, medications, procedures, etc that pertained to that condition. Does that ring a bell for anyone?
I guess it's sorta like CDS Hooks (and probably encodable in CQL) but less about the specific actions recommended to take and more "here are all the relevant things"

Hi @Brendan Keeler , there was an InfoButton track several connectathons ago that looked at using CDS Hooks as a mechanism for providing InfoButton content that looked at that question. We were able to use CDS Hooks to launch InfoButton, contextualized for a specific patient.
